Habenaria dentata (Sw.) Schltr., Repert.

Distribution:— Northern India , the Himalayas, Myanmar , Thailand , Indochina, China , Taiwan , Japan , Korea and southwards to Peninsular Malaysia and the Philippines .

Notes:— We agree with the suggestion that
H. malintana
is a peloric form of this species. The collection Daun 87 (K) was incorrectly listed as
H. plantaginea
by Jayaweera (1981: 357) .

Habenaria dentirostrata
Tang & F.T.Wang, Bull. Fan Mem. Inst. Biol.
7: 137, 1936. Type :— MYANMAR . Mandalay Region : Meiktila District ,
670 m
,

, Tha Myaing 263 ( holotype : K; isotype: E)

( Hamburg )
55: 58, 2004.

Nov 2010
,

( SING ); Meiktila District : type
.
Distribution:— Central Myanmar ,? Thailand and Indochina.
